name: Chat said what!?
description:
An intense team based maze escape game, where players interact with the game using a chat system for input.

Play modes:
- Local: 1v1 mode where players use WASD and Arrow keys to move and escape the maze.
- Streamer: Connect to a Twitch chat using a stream oauth token (instructions here)
- External: A UDP client that accepts incoming JSON payloads to connect to any other form of chat client. (Example file in GitHub)

This game was made for Global Game Jam (game page here) during stream on Twitch.

Credits:

Programming: Velopman

Art: Velopman

Music & sound effects: ...Sad face...
